title: Uppercase typeface with bigger first letters
content: Hi, I was wondering is there a specific term for uppercase typefaces which have their first letters bigger? Thank you.
author: migle

comments.content: Sorry for the post, I've figured out it already.
So ... is there a specific term? Or did you find out there isn't?
I think she may simply have had a different conceptualization of what we think of as small caps. The creativity of the human mind is cool. :)
